name: VisualStoryWriting
description: üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Writing by manipulating visual representations of stories
readme_summary: The Visual Story-Writing repository provides a system that automatically visualizes a story based on its chronological events, characters, actions, and movements. Users can then edit the story by manipulating these visual representations, with the system suggesting edits to the text based on these manipulations using GPT-4o.
key_features: Visualizing story events and character movements
Editing stories by manipulating visual representations
Suggesting text edits based on visual manipulations (e.g., connecting characters, moving characters, reordering events)
Utilizing GPT-4o for information extraction and edit suggestions
primary_use_case: Allowing users to write and edit stories by interacting with visual representations of the story's elements, such as characters, events, and timelines.
cover_image_prompt: A sculptor meticulously chisels a block of marble, revealing a scene of characters interacting on a timeline. The sculptor's tools are subtly digital, with UI elements overlaid on the marble showing code snippets and story text. The emerging scene depicts characters moving and interacting, influencing the text displayed on a nearby screen. Digital particles flow from the sculptor's hands, shaping the narrative. The setting is a bright, airy studio with natural light. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors, subtly incorporating the repository name.

name: aisheets
description: Build, enrich, and transform datasets using AI models with no code
readme_summary: AI Sheets is an open-source tool that allows users to build, enrich, and transform datasets using AI models without writing any code. It can be deployed locally or on the Hugging Face Hub, providing access to thousands of open models for data manipulation tasks.
key_features: No-code data building, enrichment, and transformation
Deployment on local machines or Hugging Face Hub
Access to thousands of open models via Inference Providers or local models
Integration with Hugging Face Jobs for large dataset generation
Support for custom LLMs via OpenAI API specification
primary_use_case: Building, enriching, and transforming datasets using AI models without code.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan meticulously crafting datasets from raw materials using advanced AI tools in a bright, modern workshop. The artisan uses a magical loom that weaves together data threads, transforming them into intricate patterns. Small screens display AI models running in the background, subtly enhancing the process. The workshop is filled with glowing particles representing data flow, and the repository name, 'AI Sheets,' is subtly etched onto a workbench. The scene has a clean, focused composition with a vibrant color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: openspot-music-app
description: OpenSpot is a free and open-source music streaming application designed for a seamless, high-fidelity listening experience. Built with a modern tech stack, it features a beautiful, responsive UI that looks great on any device.
readme_summary: OpenSpot Music is a free and open-source music streaming application designed for cross-platform use. It allows users to stream and download high-quality music without ads or login requirements, and it offers two applications: OpenSpot Mobile (React Native + Expo) for Android and iOS, and OpenSpot Desktop (Electron) for Linux, macOS, and Windows.
key_features: Cross-platform support (Android, iOS, Linux, macOS, Windows)
primary_use_case: Streaming and downloading music for free across multiple devices.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly robot DJ stands on a stage made of circuit boards, streaming music notes that flow out to various devices (phone, laptop, tablet) held by diverse people in the audience. The devices glow with vibrant colors, visualizing the music. The robot DJ uses a mixing board with subtle UI elements, and the backdrop features a stylized waveform. The scene is set in a futuristic concert hall with dynamic lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines, bright colors, and a focus on clarity and accessibility.

name: TrackWeight
description: Use your Mac trackpad as a weighing scale
readme_summary: TrackWeight is a macOS application that turns a MacBook's trackpad into a digital weighing scale by utilizing the Force Touch pressure sensors. It leverages a custom fork of the Open Multi-Touch Support library to access trackpad pressure data, allowing users to measure the weight of small objects.
key_features: Turns MacBook trackpad into a weighing scale
Requires finger contact for pressure readings
Uses Open Multi-Touch Support library for low-level access
primary_use_case: Measuring the weight of small objects using a MacBook's trackpad.
cover_image_prompt: A goldsmith meticulously weighing a precious gem on a MacBook trackpad instead of a traditional scale. The trackpad glows softly, displaying the gem's weight in grams. The goldsmith wears a magnifying glass and focuses intently on the reading. UI elements showing the TrackWeight app interface subtly float in the background. The scene is set in a cozy workshop with warm lighting. Small digital particles emanate from the trackpad, visualizing the pressure sensors at work. The composition is clean and focused with a gold and silver color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details.

name: MingCute
description: Carefully Designed Icon Library. MingCute is a set of simple and exquisite open-source icon library. Whether you're a designer or a developer, it's perfect for use in web and mobile.
readme_summary: MingCute Icon is an open-source icon library offering simple and exquisite icons for web and mobile use. It provides icons in SVG, PNG, and webfont formats, designed within a 24x24 grid with both outline and filled styles. The library can be used directly from the website, installed as an npm package, or accessed via a Figma plugin.
key_features: Available in SVG, PNG, and webfont formats
primary_use_case: Providing a set of icons for designers and developers to use in web and mobile projects.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting tiny, intricate icons on a digital loom. The loom's threads are strands of code, weaving together to form each icon. Finished icons, glowing with soft light, float gently upwards, ready to be used in various digital interfaces displayed on nearby screens. Small UI elements and code snippets are subtly visible within the loom's framework. The scene is set in a bright, organized workshop with a focus on precision and detail. The composition is clean and focused, using a pastel color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: hyperswitch
description: An open source payments switch written in Rust to make payments fast, reliable and affordable
readme_summary: Hyperswitch is an open-source payments switch written in Rust. It provides a modular payments infrastructure, allowing businesses to select and integrate specific modules like cost observability, revenue recovery, vault, and intelligent routing to optimize their payment processing without vendor lock-in.
primary_use_case: Orchestrating and optimizing payment processing by providing modular components that can be integrated into existing payment stacks.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled conductor stands before an orchestra of payment processors, each represented by a musical instrument. The conductor uses a glowing baton to intelligently route and harmonize the flow of transactions, ensuring optimal performance and cost efficiency. Visual indicators of different payment methods (cards, wallets, etc.) flow into the orchestra, while successful transactions emerge as beautiful musical notes. Small UI elements displaying routing algorithms and cost metrics subtly connect the metaphor to software. The scene is set in a grand concert hall with warm, inviting lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.
